Programs

intrusive.meetups()

intrusive.meetups() are not only a great way to immerse yourself into cybersecurity, but also to meet awesome people! Intrusive hosts monthly meetups, workshops and other fun events that provide an opportunity for students all over the city to learn something new, talk with other like-minded students, and gain insight from professionals! Check out our events page to find out about our future meetups and events!


intrusive <3 opensource

Intrusive LOVES open-sourced software! Living in a digital age, we are dedicated to provide awesome and impactful software and technologies for everyone. From digital privacy to cryptography, we hope that our code can unite people together and create change! Collaborators are ALWAYS welcomed! To learn about how YOU can help, visit our Github organization.

Questions? Concerns? Comments? Talk to us!


Intrusive is a student-run organization.

We are dedicated to providing cybersecurity education and awareness to students in the New York City area, regardless of race, gender, ethnicity, and socioeconomic background.
